_kernel_oserror* perform_risc_os_buffer_operation (  _kernel_swi_regs *  regs,
struct risc_os_buffer_info_structure *  risc_os_buffer_info
) 
 

Inline Assembler adapter to perform RISC OS buffer operations. Registers are filled on one side from given register set and on the other side with buffer informations stored inside given buffer info structure.
